manifest.install: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_sanshi_topic` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `weid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `topicname` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT '话题名称', `topicdesc` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT '话题描述', `topicback` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT '话题背景图', `topic_num` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '话题讨论人数', `topic_read` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '话题阅读数量', `is_check` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '是否需要审核', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=Innodb DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_sanshi_discuss` ( `id` int(10) NOT NULL auto_increment, `weid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `topic_id` int(10) NOT NULL COMMENT '话题ID', `openid` varchar(100) character set utf8 NOT NULL COMMENT '讨论人openid', `oauthid` varchar(100) COMMENT '讨论人openid', `discuss` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT '回复内容', `checked` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '是否审核通过', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `openid` (`openid`) ) ENGINE=Innodb DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_sanshi_discuss_zan` ( `id` int(10) NOT NULL auto_increment, `weid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `discuss_id` int(10) NOT NULL COMMENT '话题ID', `openid` varchar(100) NOT NULL COMMENT '讨论人openid', `oauthid` varchar(100) COMMENT '讨论人openid', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `openid` (`openid`) ) ENGINE=Innodb DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
